orders.models module¶

class orders.models.CartItem(id, name, price, image)[source]¶

Bases: Model

exception DoesNotExist¶

Bases: ObjectDoesNotExist

exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶

Bases: MultipleObjectsReturned

id¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

image¶

Just like the FileDescriptor, but for ImageFields. The only difference is assigning the width/height to the width_field/height_field, if appropriate.

name¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

objects = <django.db.models.manager.Manager object>¶
price¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

orders.views module¶

orders.views.addItem(request)[source]¶

Adds an item to the cart. Args:

request: Django HttpRequest object.

Returns:

JsonResponse: JSON response containing updated cart information.

orders.views.checkout(request)[source]¶

Redirects to the transaction view. Args:

request: Django HttpRequest object.

Returns:

HttpResponseRedirect: Redirects to the transaction view.

orders.views.getCartItems(request)[source]¶

Retrieves cart items from the session. Args:

request: Django HttpRequest object.

Returns:

JsonResponse: JSON response containing cart items.

orders.views.getMenuItem(request, menuItemId)[source]¶

Gets a specific menu item. Args:

request: Django HttpRequest object. menuItemId (str): ID of the menu item.

Returns:

dict: Dictionary containing menu item information.

orders.views.getNewOrderID()[source]¶

Gets a new order ID. Returns:

int: New order ID.

orders.views.getUsedInventoryItems(orderId, currentId)[source]¶

Gets a list of all inventory items needed to be updated. Args:

orderId (int): ID of the order. currentId (int): ID of the current item.

Returns:

list: List of ingredient IDs.

Renders the help page. Args:

request: Django HttpRequest object.

Returns:

HttpResponse: Rendered help page.

request: Django HttpRequest object.

Returns:

Renders the orders page. Args:

request: Django HttpRequest object.

orders.views.orders(request)[source]¶

Renders the orders page with categorized menu items. Args:

request: Django HttpRequest object.

Returns:

HttpResponse: Rendered orders page.

orders.views.removeAllIems(request)[source]¶

Removes all instances of a specific item from the cart. Args:

request: Django HttpRequest object.

Returns:

JsonResponse: JSON response containing updated cart information.

orders.views.removeItem(request)[source]¶

Removes an item from the cart. Args:

request: Django HttpRequest object.

Returns:

JsonResponse: JSON response containing updated cart information.

orders.views.textToSpeech(request)[source]¶

Converts text to speech using Google Cloud Text-to-Speech API. Args:

request: Django HttpRequest object containing ‘text’ parameter.

Returns:

HttpResponse: MP3 audio content of the synthesized speech.

orders.views.transactionView(request)[source]¶

Handles the transaction process. Args:

request: Django HttpRequest object.

Returns:

HttpResponse: Rendered transaction page.

orders.views.updateInventory(ingredientIds)[source]¶

Updates the inventory for all ingredients. Args:

ingredientIds (list): List of ingredient IDs.

orders.views.updateOrders(customerId, employeeId, totalPrice, orderTime, orderId)[source]¶

Updates the orders table. Args:

customerId (int): ID of the customer. employeeId (int): ID of the employee. totalPrice (float): Total price of the order. orderTime (datetime): Time of the order. orderId (int): ID of the order.
